education_text.0: Teng graduated with BA in      Electrical engineering electrical engineering and BS in      Computer science computer science, both from      Shanghai Jiao Tong University Shanghai Jiao Tong University in 1985Prior to joining USC in 2009, Teng was a professor at      Boston University Boston UniversityPrior to joining USC in 2009, Teng was a professor at      Boston University Boston UniversityTeng is a Fellow of the      Association for Computing Machinery Association for Computing Machinery (ACM)          as well as an      Sloan Research Fellowship Alfred P
